menu.title: Arancini Margherita
menu.description: Tomato & mozzarella risotto balls with arrabbiata sauce

menu.title: Bruschetta Al Pomodoro
menu.description: Chopped tomatoes, oregano, extra virgin olive oil, garlic and basil

menu.title: Insalata Caprese
menu.description: Sicilian organic datterini tomatoes with buffalo mozzarella D.O.P from Campania, with fresh basil, oregano & extra virgin olive oil

menu.title: Crostone Di Camponia
menu.description: Fried bread topped with traditional Sicilian vegetables with balsamic vinegar, fresh mint, peanuts & Caciocavallo cheese

menu.title: Italian Cheese Board
menu.description: Finest selection of Italian DOP cheeses served with figs, jam and bread

menu.title: Acqua Pazza
menu.description: Pan-fried fillets of fish with olives, garlic, white wine, capers, parsley & the sweetest baby plum tomatoes.

menu.title: Spaghetti Allo Scoglio
menu.description: Spaghetti with seafood (squid, clams, mussels, prawns) in white wine sauce with cherry tomatoes, chilli, garlic and parsley

menu.title: Pollo Ai Funghi
menu.description: Pan fried chicken breast with wild mushrooms in a creamy sauce, served with roast potatoes

menu.title: Rigatoni Salsiccia e Broccoli
menu.description: Pasta with fresh Italian sausage, broccoli, sundried tomatoes, black olives, garlic and stuffed with breadcrumbs

menu.title: Tagliatelle Al Ragout
menu.description: Tagliatelle pasta topped with homemade slow cooked shin beef ragout and Parmesan sauce

menu.title: Rib Eye Steak
menu.description: Premium Irish rib eye steak served with a spicy Italian style sauce and Patate al forno

menu.title: Tagliatelle Trento
menu.description: Speck meat, wild mushrooms with a hint of truffle and extra virgin olive oil

menu.title: Tiramisu
menu.description: A popular coffee-flavoured Italian custard dessert. It is made of ladyfingers dipped in coffee, layered with a whipped mixture of eggs, sugar, and mascarpone cheese, flavoured with cocoa.  Eggs, Mascarpone cheese, coffee, liqueur, cocoa.

menu.title: Creamy panna cotta
menu.description: Vanilla panna cotta with a seasonal fruit compote.

menu.title: Amalfi lemon meringue cheesecake
menu.description: Velvety mascarpone & lemon cheesecake topped with Italian meringue, served with lemon curd & blackcurrants.

menu.title: Cannoli Siciliani
menu.description: Pastry tubes filled with sweet buffalo Ricotta cheese and pistachio.

menu.title: Zabaglione Italiano
menu.description: An Italian dessert made with egg yolks, sugar, and a sweet wine (usually Moscato d'Asti or Marsala wine).

menu.title: Gelato Italiano
menu.description: Frozen Italian ice cream with refreshing flavours, choose from strawberry, pistachio, chocolate, summer berries and vanilla which are served in a chocolate bowl.
